body.value:
If qualified and interested in a specific job opening, apply to Florida State University. If you are a current FSU employee, apply via myFSU. Applicants are required to complete the online application with all applicable information. Applications must include education details even if attaching a resume. Please attach a cover letter and resume to your online application.

Faculty Positions

No positions currently available

Staff Positions

No positions currently available

Graduate Assistantship

No positions currently available

OPS/FWS Employment

No positions currently available

All part time job opportunities are advertised at FSU's Student Jobs website. Please check there on a weekly basis.

If you were awarded Federal Work Study, please review the FWS application portal to review the positions we have available. Contact the FWS office if you need assistance with accessing the portal.

FSU is an Equal opportunity/Access/Affirmative Action/Pro Disabled & Veteran Employer. FSU's Equal Opportunity Statement

Under Federal law, FSU may employ only individuals who are legally authorized to work in the United States as established by providing documents specified in the Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986.
